topComments.author: tammy hartwick
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √ìtimo lugar para o dinheiro que fomos depois das 3 na ter√ßa-feira e n√£o estava lotado em todos os meus netos 11 e 9 absolutamente adoraram. √â um pouco datado, mas ainda divertido. Se voc√™ alugar uma cabana, eles est√£o no n√≠vel superior e n√£o parecem muito pelo dinheiro que n√£o alugamos, mas tivemos a sorte de encontrar cadeiras sob uma √°rvore agrad√°vel e com sombra. √ìtimo se voc√™ estiver com or√ßamento limitado  (Original) Great place for the money we went after 3 on Tuesday and wasn't crowded at all my grandkids 11&9 absolutely loved it .. I would think older kids would get bored but great for their ages. Its a little dated but still fun. If you rent a cabana they are up on top tier and didn't look like much for the money we didn't rent one but was lucky enough to find chairs under a tree nice and shady. Great if you're on a budget

topComments.author: Ellie C
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este foi um dia divertido para as crian√ßas. Waterpark foi surpreendentemente mais silencioso do que a maioria que eu j√° estive, mas isso provavelmente se deve ao fato de ser no in√≠cio da temporada e um dia ventoso. Para n√≥s, isso significava n√£o ter filas e poder aproveitar todos os slides com frequ√™ncia. Quando eles terminaram com o parque aqu√°tico, eles gostaram da √°rea interna.  (Original) This was a fun day for the kids. Waterpark was surprisingly quieter than most that I've been to, but that's probably due to it being early in the season and a windy day. For us, that meant no lines and able to enjoy all the slides often. When they were done with the waterpark, they enjoyed the indoor area... ropes walk, laser tag,  go carts, etc., Paid the combination price for the kids and us adults just paid the Florida residents rate for the water park.

topComments.author: Cassandra Stockley
topComments.comment: I love this place, but they could do much better on the clean up in the bathrooms. As a season pass holder, they could also do more that caters to us. Besides that and the excessive overcrowding, it's s great place to cool off and let thr kids run around for a few hours.

topComments.author: FREEDOM MAAT
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √ìtimo servi√ßo ao cliente! Voc√™ ter√° um tempo maravilhoso com seus filhos ou quem voc√™ quiser trazer. Os pre√ßos s√£o salgados.  (Original) Great customer service! You will have a wonderful time with your kids or whoever you want to bring. The prices are steep.

topComments.author: Melissa
topComments.comment: My kids and I have enjoyed all the water time we have gotten. We love this place. We are here in vacation from Kentucky. Wished there was one where we live at

topComments.author: Julius Sanders
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um √≥timo dia parcialmente nublado para curtir o Parque Aqu√°tico! A fam√≠lia se divertiu muito, e foi uma vantagem atravessar a rua at√© a praia.  (Original) A great partially cloudy day to enjoy the Waterpark!  The family had a blast, and it was a plus to walk across the street to the beach.

topComments.author: Lawanda Wilson
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √ìtimo parque aqu√°tico e funcion√°rios simp√°ticos. Bons pre√ßos para comidas e bebidas. N√≥s voltaremos.  (Original) Great water park and nice staff. Good prices for food and drinks. We will be back.

topComments.author: James & Samantha Krueger
topComments.comment: While on vacation decided to take the grandsons here. We spent 7hrs there. We enjoyed the water park, arcade, also drove the go carts. I was surprised of how big yet small this place was. The staff was very friendly and helpful. They have some of the best lifeguards, they were continuously checking their area. Their prices were  reasonable. The food was good with several options to choose from. I really enjoyed seeing kids, parents, grandparents even great grandparents sliding down the slides and relaxing in the lazy river. Has a nice clean fun family atmosphere. Fun for all ages. We really enjoyed ourselves. Definitely will return.

topComments.author: AutismWelcomed DecalSymbol
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) T√£o feliz por ter encontrado este lugar maravilhoso para preencher um vazio doloroso na rotina de quarta-feira do meu filho adulto autista! Hoje foi muito perturbador para My Dustin, considerando que era seu primeiro dia sem ver seu terapeuta ocupacional que se aposentou e ele est√° vendo semanalmente desde os 2 anos. Meu Dustin √© severamente autista e far√° 26 anos em agosto, mas ainda tem uma mentalidade de 3-5 anos. √â claro que eu tive que dirigir meu filho que √© incapaz de dirigir sozinho e que absolutamente tinha que ter seus 2 amigos de pel√∫cia favoritos para o passeio e confort√°-lo durante sua nova aventura. T√£o bom que este lugar tem carrinhos duplos! Escusado ser√° dizer que depois de ver as √∫ltimas fotos dele saindo do carrinho de passeio .... Camryn que era o trabalhador mais doce e compreensivo aqui na √°rea de carrinho de passeio .... Ele claramente fez o dia do meu filho mais feliz! Obrigado, obrigado! Ent√£o te valorizo ‚Äã‚Äã‚ù§Ô∏è At√© a pr√≥xima quarta-feira! Angela (aka) #SMAARTMom & #MyDustin  (Original) So glad I found this Wonderful place to fill a heartbreaking void in my autistic adult son's Wednesday routine! Today was very upsetting for My Dustin considering it was his first day of not seeing his Occupational Therapist who retired and he's been seeing weekly since he was 2 yrs. My Dustin is severely autistic and will be 26yr old in August but still has a mentality of a 3-5yr old. I of course had to drive my son who is unable to drive himself and who absolutely had to have his 2 favorite plush friends come for the ride and comfort him during his new adventure. So nice that this place has double seated carts! Needless to say after you see the last pics of him getting off the go cart....Camryn who was the most sweet and understanding worker here at the go cart area ....He clearly made my son's Day a happier One ! Thank You, Thank You!   So Appreciate you ‚ù§Ô∏è See you next Wednesday! Angela (aka) #SMAARTMom & #MyDustin

topComments.author: Albert Oramas
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Chegamos a Daytona Lagoon nos √∫ltimos 25 anos. Chegamos √† lagoa Daytona desde que estava aberta. Eles permitiram que este lugar desmoronasse e parece terr√≠vel. A maioria dos slides est√£o fechados e em mau estado. Alugou uma Cabana por US $ 130, mas nenhum servi√ßo de comida ou bebida. Desperd√≠cio de dinheiro. Foto de telhado podre na cabana. ATUALIZA√á√ÉO, portanto, na resposta que aborda as preocupa√ß√µes (da ger√™ncia) que fiz e o pr√≥prio fato de que eles me deram uma maneira de entrar em contato para resolver problemas me mostra que eles se importam. Vou atualiz√°-los para tr√™s estrelas. Eu estarei de volta em um ano para ver se o que eles dizem √© verdade.  (Original) We‚Äôve been come to Daytona Lagoon over past 25 years. We‚Äôve come to Daytona lagoon since it was open. They‚Äôve allowed this place to run down and it looks terrible. Most of the slides are closed and in disrepair. Rented a Cabana at a whopping $130 but no food or drink service. Waste of money. Photo of rotting roof on cabana. UPDATE, so in the response that addresses the concerns (from management ) I made and the very fact that they‚Äôve given me a way to reach out to resolve issues shows me that they do care. I will upgrade them to three stars.  I‚Äôll be back in a year to see if what they say is true.

topComments.author: Ford Family
topComments.comment: this is the best place i have ever taken my kids! lived in florida and done about everything. by far the best. lifeguards trained by sammy were the best. treasure and the cook did great with food and good prices. dave and another welcome greeter started us out with a big family welcome. i felt so safe with my kids and they were not over the shoulder with non sense rules. it was safety without making it a burdon. i never felt so safe with my kids as a parent. lines went smooth and as a guest i was fed and loved on. this place is a must! manager was more than welcoming. do not pass on this place. also theres parking. in florida this is a gem!! daytona lagoon keep this team happy you would be silly to let the staff not be appreciated

topComments.author: Courtney Williams
topComments.comment: Family fun indoors on this gloomy day! Clean bathrooms and lots of games indoors and outside. Hope to come back over the summer!

topComments.author: Stania Paul
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Foi uma experi√™ncia muito boa, √© definitivamente um bom lugar para trazer crian√ßas, fique de olho nelas. Mas definitivamente vai cans√°-los no caminho de volta para casa.  (Original) It was a real good experience, Is definitely a good place to bring kids, keep an eye on them. But it will definitely tired them out on the drive back home.

topComments.author: Its time. MelyndaGarrett
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu e meu filho nos divertimos muito! Jogamos o dia todo! Ele at√© ganhou o jackpot de 1000 bilhetes na sua primeira vez l√°! Laser tag, minigolfe, karts, fliperama, MUITO DIVERTIDO! Muito mais barato do que Dave e Busters! Voc√™ ganha muito mais jogando pelos seus d√≥lares!  (Original) I and my son had a blast! We played all day! He even won the jackpot of 1000 tickets his very first time there! Laser tag, mini golf, go-karts, arcade, GREAT FUN! Way cheaper than Dave and Busters! You get way more playing for your dollars!

topComments.author: Tania Nova
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Acho que est√° tudo bem para o que voc√™ pagou, alguns dos tobo√°guas est√£o fechados. Meus filhos adoram aqui, eles se divertiram muito. O pre√ßo da comida √© um pouco caro e a espera √© rid√≠cula Eu espero mais 45 minutos por uma pizza e o cara ali disse que acabou de confundir meu pedido com o de outra pessoa üôÑ O resto est√° ok, eu gostaria que eles abrissem todos os tobo√°guas. A piscina de ondas estava fechada um pouco, mas a abri-la.  (Original) Is ok for what you paid I guess, some of the water slides are closed. My kids love it here, they had so much fun. The price for the food is a little over priced and the wait is ridiculous I wait more the 45 minutes for a pizza and the the guy over there said he just confused my order with other person üôÑ The rest is ok I wish they open all the water slides. The waves pool was closed for a little bit but the open it.

topComments.author: Jennifer Kingsland
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um pouco caro quando a maior parte da atra√ß√£o estava fechada. Foi cobrado o pre√ßo total pelo meu bc de 2 anos de idade, ela era "muito alta". Nenhum rio lento. Estava em manuten√ß√£o, disseram. Piscinas foram isoladas. Havia 2 tobo√°guas abertos e a √°rea infantil com 2 mini tobo√°guas. Nenhuma concess√£o estava aberta, exceto pizza cara dentro de casa. Eu j√° tive uma experi√™ncia maravilhosa h√° 10 anos. Desta vez, n√£o tanto. Decepcionado üòû  (Original) A bit pricey when most of the attraction was closed. Charged full price for my 2 yr old bc she was "too tall".  No lazy river. Was down for maintenance they said. Pools were roped off. There were 2 water slides open and the kiddie splash area with 2 mini slides. No concessions were open besides expensive pizza indoors. I previously had a wonderful experience 10 years ago. This time not so much. Disappointed üòû

topComments.author: david knowlton
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Meu filho e eu gostamos da pista de kart. Correr e passar um pelo outro era divertido. O foi um grande arcade moderno tanto do meu filho apreciado. Em particular, o Jurassic Park e o boliche eram seus favoritos. N√£o experimentamos os passeios aqu√°ticos ou o minigolfe, mas talvez essa seja a pr√≥xima aventura.  (Original) My son and I enjoyed the go cart track. Racing and passing each other was fun. The was a large modern arcade both my son's enjoyed. In particular the Jurassic park and the bowling were their favorites. We did not try the water rides or the mini golf but maybe that will be the next adventure.

topComments.author: Milton Davila
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Local de atra√ß√µes aqu√°ticas muito bom. Limpo e adequado aos tempos. Meus filhos entre 3 e 5 anos gostaram muito. topComments.author: Jeffery Brannan
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Os slides s√£o decentes, mas o lugar n√£o √© √≥timo. Dois dos oito tobo√°guas e a piscina de ondas n√£o estavam funcionando. Mais da metade da equipe parecia preferir estar em outro lugar. Eles realmente pareciam ter falta de interesse em mudar as linhas e garantir que as pessoas estivessem se divertindo. Barato o suficiente, exceto pelo estacionamento (US $ 9 por pouco mais de 4 horas)  (Original) The slides are decent but the place isn't great. Two of the eight slides and the wave pool were not working. More than half the staff seemed like they'd rather be anywhere else. They really seemed to have a lack of interest in moving the lines and making sure people were having fun. Cheap enough, except for parking ($9 for just over 4 hours)
